title: Light Up 7 is Now in Australia!
description: Light Up 7 is expanding to Sydney, Australia! Discover our journey and plans to bring creative excellence to the land down under.

page_content.html_content:
After 10 years of grinding the axe and cutting our teeth to become a leading name in Malaysia’s creative and marketing industry, we’re ready to take the next step! We’re broadening our horizons all the way to the land down under, establishing our presence as branding agency in Sydney, Australia.

This expansion marks an exciting chapter in Light Up 7’s journey—a leap reflecting our growth and our ambition to push boundaries, explore new markets, and grow our expertise to even greater heights.

Why Australia?

Sydney isn’t just a beautiful coastal city; it’s a vibrant hub for business, culture, and innovation. Australia’s digital advertising market alone is projected to grow to AUD 14 billion by 2027, driven by its highly digital-savvy population and dynamic industries. From technology and entertainment to retail and finance, Sydney offers an ecosystem brimming with opportunities for a creative and branding agency like ours to thrive.

This new market offers Light Up 7 the chance to engage with a fresh audience, collaborate with local experts, and bring our unique approach to branding, marketing, and digital solutions to the table.

A Decade of Achievements

Since our inception in 2014, Light Up 7 has reached many significant milestones that have shaped who we are today. From delivering award-winning campaigns for top Malaysian brands to becoming one of the most trusted names in digital marketing, the journey has been one of hard work, growth, and innovation.

Among our proudest moments:

  • Winning industry awards like Agency of The Year, MARKies, Dragons of Malaysia for our excellence in creative and branding campaigns.
  • Partnering with brands, authority bodies, MNCs and NGOs like 7-Eleven, the Central Bank of Malaysia, Petronas and UNICEF.
  • Driving impactful results for our clients with data-driven marketing, cutting-edge design and the latest in video and event production.

It’s been a journey full of blood, sweat, and sometimes tears, but looking back, we wouldn’t have it any other way. Each step has prepared us for this exciting new leap forward.

Our Hopes for Sydney

As a new branding agency in Australia, we’re eager to expand our horizons, bring fresh perspectives to our work, and learn from the incredibly talented experts in Sydney’s creative and marketing industries. Our goal is to build meaningful partnerships and make an impact on Australian businesses by delivering branding and marketing solutions that not only drive results but also inspire.

From crafting engaging digital campaigns to helping businesses refine their brand identity, we’re ready to make waves in Australia’s dynamic market.

Join Us on This Journey

If you’re based in Australia and looking for a creative partner to bring your brand to life, hit us up! We’d love to collaborate, connect, and be part of your success story.

Here’s to exciting new beginnings in Sydney. Let’s light up this journey together!
